html:
• Home
  • Careers

Michele Marie PR is seeking a highly organized, bright, enthusiastic, and driven individual for a full-time position as a VIP AE or SAE to join our team in Los Angeles,

A full-service bi-coastal public relations agency, Michele Marie PR offers an innovative approach to editorial, celebrity/influencer and event PR across fashion, beauty, wellness, and lifestyle categories. Female Founded and entering our 18th year in business averaging double digit growth each year, MMPR prides itself in making our “teamwork make the dreamwork” in our thriving, fast paced, results driven work environment.

Candidates for VIP Account Executive must have at least 3+ years of experience and currently securing celebrity and influencer placements, and knowledgeable in facilitating gifting and loans. Must have strong contacts with stylists and celebrity teams for gifting. Candidates must be based in LA and able to work in office on a hybrid schedule.

We are looking for a flexible individual with the skill-set to manage multiple accounts. Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Power Point, Excel). Experience using MuckRack, Fashion GPS and Mayvien is a plus, but is not required. Well-versed with social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, etc.)

● Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Power Point, Excel)
● Experience using Muckrack/LEFTY influencer tracking is a plus, but is not required
● Experience with executing client events is a plus, but not required.
● Must be detailed oriented, possess strong organizational and time management skills, solutions oriented
● Positive, proactive and hard-working attitude
● Ability to assist and lead on multiple client accounts at once
● Eager to work in a very fast-paced industry

MMPR offers competitive salaries and hybrid schedules, Medical, Vision and Dental benefits, 401k, short day Fridays year round, Perk Program, 3 weeks paid vacations, and paid PTO.

Compensation: Starting salary $55k, dependent on experience.

To Apply: Please send your resume to jobs@michelemariepr.com, subject line VIP.

@michelemariepr
